Package com.noelios.restlet.ext.jdbc

Extension package providing integration with JDBC 3.0.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
JdbcCall Call sending a request via a JDBC client connector.
JdbcClient Client connector to a JDBC database.
JdbcResult JDBC result wrapper.
